1110101110101101 1100011111010001 1 -> sum: 1011001101111111, cout: 1
0111011101011100 1000110100110100 0 -> sum: 0000010010010000, cout: 1
0011101010010000 0000100111011011 1 -> sum: 0100010001101100, cout: 0
0110100011111100 1101100010100011 0 -> sum: 0100000110011111, cout: 1
1110111001100011 0110010010110010 0 -> sum: 0101001100010101, cout: 1
0100001101110110 1110011100010010 1 -> sum: 0010101010001001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
